reference: Andrews, D.F., Bickel, P.J., Hampel, F.R., Huber, P.J., Rogers, W.H. and Tukey, J.W. (1972). Robust Estimates of Location, Princeton University Press, Princeton, N.J.

Gross, A.M. (1974). Confidence Interval Robustness with Long-Tailed, Symmetric Distributions. Submitted to JASA.
Gross, A.M. (1975). Confidence Intervals for Bisquare Regression Estimates. Bell laboratories Technical Memorandum.
